overview: The Pure Girls, an all female production brings to you a DVD full of Tease, Temptation and Ultimate Pleasure. Set in a dark grimy cage, with dirty walls and only the sound of footsteps can be heard. The girls are being watched, but what happens next when they are caught fucking each other? The smell of sex in the room is lingering, Can you smell it? So step inside the world of the Pure Girls and let them fuck you up.
title: Do As Your Told
